meanings.definition: To state again or in a different way.
meanings.sent1: She kept restating the same idea to make sure everyone understood.
meanings.sent2: He is restating his argument in a clearer manner.
meanings.sent3: The parrot was restating the words it had just heard, much to everyone's amusement.
meanings.sent4: Her song was like restating a beautiful melody over and over, each time with a new twist.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's method of restating key points helped the students remember the lesson better.

meanings.definition: The act of stating something again.
meanings.sent1: The restating of facts is crucial in making sure everyone is on the same page.
meanings.sent2: His constant restating of the rules became a bit annoying after a while.
meanings.sent3: The restating of the joke by the comedian had the audience laughing even harder.
meanings.sent4: The restating of history in the documentary shed new light on past events.
meanings.sent5: The restating of the company's mission statement reminded employees of their core values.
